message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly useful for your needs.  I'd like to get $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate you countering, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate,  $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $13,000?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
